issue.title: Completing integration tests for major implemented data types
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1277](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1277). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Umbrella issue to track status of integration testing for remaining data types

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1277?focusedCommentId=17120362) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
All linked issues are resolved; we can track other issues with the Integration component and/or Blocker status.
